name: En.ReSourcer's TurboTime
description:
#retro #racing #arcade #recreate

MONITOR BUILD VERSION:

"Jump in your kart and race to the finish!"

Four courses with twenty tracks. Be the greatest racer you'll ever be in a tournament Grand Prix of TurboTime. Be the best driver to get past the finish line to win a trophy. Race with the Blue Racers ALSO finishes the track before times run out.

CABINET SCALE MODEL VERSION:

Scale model in real-life. Coming soon built as the exact built like an actual arcade game.

Feature from the full built:

  • Cycle stages. (Till you've reached 256)
  • Coin Challange
  • Opponents compete
  • VGM Arcade
  • Language Set-Up
  • [ Licensed from the original ]
